Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: There's not much else to do here.

Children.Title: Rest
Children.Tooltip: Rest for a moment and record your progress.

Children.Title: Greet
Children.Tooltip: Exchange pleasantries.

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Return outside...

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Return outside.

Children.Title: Talk
Children.Tooltip: Speak with the priestess.

Children.Title: Iso
Children.Tooltip: Ask Willow if she has seen Iso around.

Children.Title: Spirits
Children.Tooltip: Ask her to tell you more about these spirits she talked about.

Children.Title: The Shore
Children.Tooltip: Ask what she knows of this mystical 'shore'.

Children.Title: Amber
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the amber crystals you've heard about.

Children.Title: Possession
Children.Tooltip: Say that you found some on your journey.

Children.Title: Rumors
Children.Tooltip: Say that you've overheard rumors about it.

Children.Title: Desire
Children.Tooltip: Say that you seek to discover it for yourself.

Children.Title: Adepts
Children.Tooltip: Ask what Adepts are, then - are they trained users?

Children.Title: Old Book
Children.Tooltip: Show the old tome you found in Dalsida Abbey.

Children.Title: Rest
Children.Tooltip: Rest for a moment and record your progress.

Nodes.Comment: Replace Iso's ring with the "revealed" one

Children.Title: Explain
Children.Tooltip: Something went wrong...

Children.Title: What
Children.Tooltip: Ask her if she knows what this ring is.

Children.Title: Rux
Children.Tooltip: Ask how she knows an Adept.

Children.Title: Randall
Children.Tooltip: Ask why Randall is chasing after her.

Children.Title: Plan
Children.Tooltip: Ask her what this 'plan' was that supposedly failed.

Children.Title: Panic
Children.Tooltip: Ask her why she is in such a panicked hurry.

Children.Title: Ring
Children.Tooltip: Ask her why you, not Iso, possess the ring.

Children.Title: How
Children.Tooltip: Ask her how she knows about this ring.

Children.Title: Confirm
Children.Tooltip: Say that you do still have the strange ring you woke up with.

Children.Title: How
Children.Tooltip: Ask her how she knows you woke up with a strange ring.

Children.Title: Punch
Children.Tooltip: [Strength & Agility] Give Randall a good whack while he's staggered.

Children.Title: Grapple
Children.Tooltip: [Body & Wits] Try to restrain Randall to buy Iso some time.
